message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the potential impact it could have on your operations, we propose a price of $1300000 for the product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, $1300000 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $1150000 for the product. This offer reflects the value I place on the product and aligns with my current financial constraints.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. To better align with your budget while still reflecting the value of the product, we propose a revised price of $1250000.

Alice, I appreciate you working with me on this. While $1250000 is a step in the right direction, I'm still a bit over my budget. I'm willing to go to $1200000 for the product. This is my final offer, as it aligns with my budget and reflects the value I see in the product.
